sentences.sContent: This one branch is the Liberty of Thought: from which it is impossible to separate the cognate liberty of speaking and of writing.
sentences.sContent_eng: This one branch is the Liberty of Thought: from which it is impossible to separate the cognate liberty of speaking and of writing.
sentences.sCn: 这条支线就是思想的自由。 把同源的言语的自由与写作的自由和思想的自由分开是不可能的。

sentences.sContent: There is no Hebrew or Greek cognate word in the Biblical text to reflect the modern term "same-sex orientation" or "homosexuality."
sentences.sContent_eng: There is no Hebrew or Greek cognate word in the Biblical text to reflect the modern term "same-sex orientation" or "homosexuality."
sentences.sCn: 在《圣经》文本中，没有关于现代概念“同性恋取向”或“同性恋”的希伯来文或希腊文的同源词。

trans.tranOther: cognate words or languages have the same origin
